text: "Rise" is a 1986 song by English alternative rock band Public Image Ltd. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album Album. It went to number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 29 in New Zealand and number 10 in Ireland. It was written at the time of the Apartheid and was the band's biggest hits of their career. == References == Category:1986 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Public Image Ltd songs
title: Rise (Public Image Ltd song)
